subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Melky Cabrera, who served a 50-game suspension in 2012 and was frequently hurt in 2013, has led the Blue Jays to a rare spot: first place in the A.L. East.
snippet: Melky Cabrera, who served a 50-game suspension in 2012 and was frequently hurt in 2013, has led the Blue Jays to a rare spot: first place in the A.L. East.
